This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: mydrive.ch
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://www.mydrive.ch/browse](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mydrive.ch%2Fbrowse) ### Comment > This cloud storage website, even though I have a "premium" subscription, flicks through their product portfolio every 12 seconds or so in the bottom left corner, which is very distracting while concentrating on working on files in the center of the screen. Since it is only visible while logged-in, I've made two screenshots with one being uBlock's rule generator, to see the path of the images. The number in brackets changes every 12 seconds by images being rotated, with the rule "www.mydrive.ch##.softronics-products" I was able to hide the banner without further breakage. ### Screenshots

commits.message:
Fix #146919 superwatchman.com

The rules having `.elementor-widget-wrap >` can be replaced with the following rule when an ExtCSS :has bug is resolved:
.elementor-widget-wrap > .elementor-element:has(~ div + .elementor-widget-social-icons)

I see the two leftovers if I enable AdGuard Base, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard TPF, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard annoyances and List-KR filter.
Please see https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/commit/c15a30d3570354ca49cafc1b201f1b7d096f6c90.

I think that It is highly related to the reporter's configuration; I commented like [this](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/146662#issuecomment-1490525620).
By seeing that Apious's filter and DNS filter are registered, the reporter received a help from Apious who performs their own sitcom.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://www.mydrive.ch/browse](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mydrive.ch%2Fbrowse) ### Comment > This cloud storage website, even though I have a "premium" subscription, flicks through their product portfolio every 12 seconds or so in the bottom left corner, which is very distracting while concentrating on working on files in the center of the screen. Since it is only visible while logged-in, I've made two screenshots with one being uBlock's rule generator, to see the path of the images. The number in brackets changes every 12 seconds by images being rotated, with the rule "www.mydrive.ch##.softronics-products" I was able to hide the banner without further breakage. ### Screenshots

issue.title: mydrive.ch

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://www.mydrive.ch/browse](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mydrive.ch%2Fbrowse) ### Comment > This cloud storage website, even though I have a "premium" subscription, flicks through their product portfolio every 12 seconds or so in the bottom left corner, which is very distracting while concentrating on working on files in the center of the screen. Since it is only visible while logged-in, I've made two screenshots with one being uBlock's rule generator, to see the path of the images. The number in brackets changes every 12 seconds by images being rotated, with the rule "www.mydrive.ch##.softronics-products" I was able to hide the banner without further breakage. ### Screenshots

issue.title: cardmates.org
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances  pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://cardmates.org/
